replaceBindingFromDescription

public DNSBindingIP replaceBindingFromDescription(org.smartfrog.sfcore.componentdescription.ComponentDescription cd)
                                           throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogDeploymentException
Constructs from description and replaces a new binding as child of this zone component. If it is not present it is just added. We gave it an attribute equal to its name.

Parameters:
cd - A component description for the binding data object.
Returns:
The old binding with the same name or null.
Throws:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogDeploymentException - if an error occurs while deploying binding.

getNameServerHostName

public java.lang.String getNameServerHostName()
Gets the host name that will appear in the NS records as master of the zone. If it has not been set we default to the one common to all the views/zones.
